# list of cisst libraries needed
set (REQUIRED_CISST_LIBRARIES cisstCommon cisstVector cisstOSAbstraction
                              cisstMultiTask cisstParameterTypes cisstFLTK)

# find cisst and make sure the required libraries have been compiled
find_package (cisst REQUIRED ${REQUIRED_CISST_LIBRARIES})

if (cisst_FOUND)

  # load cisst configuration
  include (${CISST_USE_FILE})

  # sawSartoriusScale has been compiled within cisst, we should find it automatically
  find_package (sawSartoriusScale REQUIRED HINTS "${cisst_saw_BINARY_DIR}/saw/components")

  if (sawSartoriusScale_FOUND)

    # sawSartoriusScale configuration
    include_directories (${sawSartoriusScale_INCLUDE_DIR})
    link_directories (${sawSartoriusScale_LIBRARY_DIR})

    fltk_wrap_ui (sawSartoriusScaleExampleFLTK displayUI.fl)

    # name the main executable and specifies with source files to use
    add_executable (sawSartoriusScaleExampleFLTK
                    # code files to compile
                    displayTask.cpp
                    main.cpp
                    # header files are provided for information
                    displayTask.h
                    # files generated by fluid
                    ${sawSartoriusScaleExampleFLTK_FLTK_UI_SRCS}
                    )

    # link against non cisst libraries and saw components
    target_link_libraries (sawSartoriusScaleExampleFLTK
                           ${sawSartoriusScale_LIBRARIES}
                           )
    # link against cisst libraries (and dependencies)
    cisst_target_link_libraries (sawSartoriusScaleExampleFLTK ${REQUIRED_CISST_LIBRARIES})

  endif (sawSartoriusScale_FOUND)

endif (cisst_FOUND)
